title: Moominvalley
resume:
Moominalley is an animated drama series, which follows the life and adventures of Moomintroll, who is curious, kind and idealistic. Moomintroll is a typical hero in a coming-of-age story: he tries to tackle the puzzle of growing up to his true, individualistic self while remaining a beloved part of the family. 
The show is directed by Steve Box, who is best known for his work with Wallace and Gromit, and produced by Gutsy Animations, a production company based in Finland. First two episodes will be broadcasted at christmas 2018 on Yle and Sky One.
